thing-type.label: iShutter iShutter
thing-type.description: iShutter<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtShutter Control</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtContinuously switch on and switch off the external switch 3 times quickly to start the inclusion or exclusion process</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtContinuously switch on and switch off the external switch 3 times quickly to start the inclusion or exclusion process</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtAlways awake.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Buttons Mode
parameter.description: See overview<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 -&gt; One push button</p&gt <p&gt1 -&gt; Two paddles with Power and Direction</p&gt <p&gt2 -&gt; Two toggle switch</p&gt <p&gt3 -&gt; Two buttons with neutral position </p&gt <p&gtOne push button: One button is used (chose any), press while moving up and down, stops, while stopped moves to opposite direction to previous. Two buttons with neutral position: Up click moves up if stopped and stops if moving down, Down click moves down </p&gt</p&gt

options.option: Two paddles with Power and Direction

parameter.name: config_2_2
parameter.label: 2: Automatically close after
parameter.description: If not zero, automatically close blind after a user defined time

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: What to do on RF close command
parameter.description: Defines how to interpret RF Off command.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 -&gt; Close</p&gt <p&gt1 -&gt; Ignore</p&gt <p&gt2 -&gt; Open</p&gt <p&gt3 -&gt; Open if closed, otherwise Close</p&gt <p&gtCan be used in conjunction with Auto Close function: Ignore - to open the door by motion detectors and close it back after some amount of time: in case of multiple motion detectors each would try to open that would that would break logics; Open - to open on both On and Off paddle press on the remote and close after some amount of time. Button close click will still work (if button operations are not disabled). Note that Dim Down command will still begin close motion. </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Typical click timeout
parameter.description: time used to differentiate click, hold, double and triple clicks<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt1 - 100 -&gt; in 10ms units</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Action on button press or hold
parameter.description: Defines which command should be sent to Association group<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtDefines which command should be sent to Association group on button press or hold. Scene mode will send 1 for Up event, 2 for Stop, 3 for Down.</p&gt <p&gt1 -&gt; Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set and MultiLevel Start/Stop Changing</p&gt <p&gt2 -&gt; Send Scene </p&gt</p&gt

options.option: Switch On, Off and dim using Basic Set

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: LED mode
parameter.description: Set LED indication mode<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 -&gt; Disabled</p&gt <p&gt1 -&gt; Show working state</p&gt <p&gt2 -&gt; Always on</p&gt <p&gt3 -&gt; Show opened state</p&gt <p&gt4 -&gt; Indicator Command Class</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Full close time
parameter.description: Time to go from opened to closed state.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtUsed to estimate the current level. Note that in Permanent motion mode the reported value would a be Closed or Opened, while all Basic and multilevel Set values (1-99, 255) would Open except 0 value that would Close. </p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_11_1
parameter.label: 11: Full open time
parameter.description: Time to go from closed to open state<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTime to go from closed to open state. This value may differ from Full close time for some blinds due to gravity. Used to estimate the current level. Note that in Permanent motion mode the reported value would a be Closed or Opened, while all Basic and Multilevel Set values (1-99, 255) would Open except 0 value that would Close</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: Node Id of the blocking device
parameter.description: Id of the device which commands would not be Open/Close, but as block/unblock.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtId of the device which commands would be interpreted not as Open/Close, but as block/unblock. Usefull with door opening detector: if the door is open, block the blind not to break shades while they move.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: Protected command
parameter.description: Protected command<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtWhich command from blocking device is closed door and hence, unprotected.</p&gt <p&gt0 -&gt; on On</p&gt <p&gt1 -&gt; on Off</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: Invert open and close relays
parameter.description: Allow exchanging open and close relays<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtAllow exchanging open and close relays if blind control is wired to the motor incorrectly </p&gt <p&gt0 -&gt; No</p&gt <p&gt1 -&gt; Yes</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.label: 1: Click, press and hold of up/down buttons
